des:
If you have any problem when you use this skill, please contact us with email: techsupport@nexxtsolution.com

Nexxt Solutions Home products help you control home appliance.You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or dim the light.

Connecting Alexa to your smart products in a few simple steps:

1) download our "Nexxt Home" app in google play and IOS app store 
2) Register one account in our "Nexxt Home" app 
3) You need to have some Nexxt Home devices available
4) Configure these devices in our "Nexxt Home" app and change to desire name for your devices which will be used in "Nexxt Solutions Home" skill
5) Download the Amazon " Alexa" app from Google Play or Appstore
6) Configure echo with Alexa app
7) Search "Nexxt Solutions Home" skill from the "Alexa" app skill category
8) Click enable Skill of "Nexxt Solutions Home", and you will be navigated to "Nexxt Home" login page
9) Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking
10) Now all setup is finished you can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these

"Alexa, turn on kitchen light"
"Alexa, turn off kitchen light"
"Alexa, dim livingroom light"
"Alexa, brighten livingroom light"
"Alexa, set the Livingroom light to 20 percent"
“Alexa, set bedroom light to Blue”
"Alexa, turn on bedroom heater"
